titleStmt.title: A fragment of Konungs skuggsjá : AM 1056 IX 4to : A digital edition

availability.p: Licence accepted by the editor Nina Stensaker in a meeting with Odd Einar Haugen, 12 May 2016.

notesStmt.note: Produced as part of my master’s thesis on Konungs skuggsjá at University of Bergen.

sourceDesc.bibl: Photographic facsimiles of the whole fragment from the Arnamagnæan Manuscript Collection at the University of Copenhagen.

msItem.title: Konungs skuggsjá
Kgs
msItem.note: Fragment. See the edition by Ludvig Holm-Olsen (1983), p. 141, for textual correspondence with the main manuscript, AM 243 b alfa fol.

supportDesc.collation: Two consecutive leaves. However, both of them are defective.

projectDesc.p: This encoding follows the standard set out in The Menota handbook (version 2.0), at http://www.menota.org/handbook.xml as of 2008-05-16.
The encoded text has numbered pagebreaks, and linebreaks according to the manuscript.

correction.p: This text has been transcribed directly from photographic colour facsimiles of the manuscript.

normalization.p: This text has been encoded on all three focal levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalised.

interpretation.p: The whole text has been lemmatised and morphologically analysed.

revisionDesc.change: 2019-10-09 Nina Stensaker University of Bergen : Corrected the position of lb on the norm level.
2019-08-11 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Added "ed=ms" to the "pb", "cb" and "lb" elements, and commented out col. A on fol. 2v.
2019-08-10 Nina Stensaker University of Bergen : (1) Finished a complete lemmatisation and morphological annotation using the emroon database. (2) Exported the file from emroon to Menota.
2016-07-25 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Added a reference to the availability of photographic facsimiles (see the "bibl" element of the "sourceDesc" element above).
2016-07-22 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Added "ed=ms" to the "pb", "cb" and "lb" elements (in order to make breaks visible in Corpuscle), and updated the file to version 1.0
2016-07-19 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Updated the header and set the date of publication to 19 July 2016, and the version to 0.9
2016-05-12 Nina Stensaker University of Bergen : (1) Changed "pc" elements for manuscript punctuation to "me:punct" elements, (2) added supplementary hyphenation for words across linebreaks.
2017-10-25 Nina Stensaker University of Bergen : (1) Finished all three focal levels.
